title: I am very interested to the UPSC exam. What books can I buy? Is there any option to buy books without coaching? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: UPSC Civil Services Exam consists of 3 stages: preliminary exam (objective)main exam (written)interview (personality test)Every year, thousands of candidates work hard to clear the exam, but only a few lucky ones get through. Be it coaching or self study you need to be through and dedicated in your preparations. You can buy books for UPSC examination at MYPUSTAK. They provide a set of books only for UPSC exams for FREE OF COST with a minimum shipping charges . All the books are the best books in regarding to the UPSC syllabus. So do not waste your time in searching best books for UPSC, instead order books from MYPUSTAK and start your preparation. And crack the Examination. ALL THE BEST!
